name: Health care
description: Emergency care and transportation to hospitals, nursing, preventative health services.

name: Wellness and Mental Health services
description: Provides counseling, therapy sessions, stress management workshops, and mental health assessments.

name: Cleaning
description: Residential and commercial cleaning. Includes housekeeping cleaning, dusting, carpet cleaning, window washing. Also includes pressure washing, deep cleaning, dry cleaning, sanitizing, event cleaning, disaster cleaning and restoration.

name: Cooking
description: Meal preparation, catering for events, personalized meal plans, and private chef services.

name: Middle school education
description: Subject-specific teaching and tutoring, special education support.

name: High school education
description: Subject-specific teaching and tutoring, college preparatory assistance, and vocational training.

name: Education for adults
description: Assistance with continuing education courses, professional certification programs, language courses, adult literacy programs.

name: Building Construction
description: Building, renovations, maintenance and repair, carpentry.

name: Electrical
description: Wiring installation, electrical repair and maintenance

name: Plumbing
description: Installation of pipes, fixtures, appliances, boilers, drainage systems. Repair and maintenance of leaks or blockages, pipe replacements.

name: Landscaping
description: Lawn care and mowing, tree and foliage planting and maintenance, irragation system installation. Landscape design consulting.

name: IT and computer support
description: IT support, computer repair, network setup, software installation, cybersecurity consulting.

name: Finance and Insurance consulting
description: Financial planning, investment advice, risk management, insurance consulting and evaluation.

name: Childcare
description: Daycare services, after-school care, babysitting, and early childhood education programs.

name: Food Service
description: Private home chef services, event catering, and personalized cooking assistance.

name: Training services
description: Job coaching and consulting, skill development assistance, safety training.

name: Fitness
description: Personal training, group fitness classes, nutrition coaching, and fitness assessments.

name: Pest Removal Services
description: Extermination of insects, rodent control, and wildlife removal.
